subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams and Elena Dementieva advanced to the final of the Kremlin Cup in Moscow. Williams beat top-seeded Svetlana Kuznetsova, 7-6 (2), 6-1, and Dementieva eliminated Dinara Safina, 6-1, 6-0. In the men’s semifinals, the defending champion Nikolay Davydenko beat Janko Tipsarevic, 7-6 (6), 6-1; and Paul-Henri Mathieu downed Michael Berrer, 7-5, 6-3.
